resources.string: We couldn\'t find the page you are looking for. Try again.
Something went wrong. Check the information and try again.
It looks like you\'re offline. Check your connection and try again.
We got some invalid data from the server. Check if the app is updated and try again or contact support.
An internal server error occurred. Try again or contact support.
The connection to the server cannot be trusted and for security reasons we won\'t continue. Check if the time is correct and try again or contact IT or support.
